name: Jet-Frog
description:
Space to jump

W to jet

A,D to set direction

Collect 3 golden beetles and reach the end as quick as you can!

This game was made in 3 days for Mini-Jam 79. Thanks for playing!

Note: Jumping is reset by colliding with the terrain. You can collide with something in the air and jump again. Sometimes, you might also be stuck on the ground unable to jump, and the best thing is to jet bump into a wall to try to 'unjam' the jump function.
